{% extends 'apidoc.html' %} {% block title %}Tile5 API Documentation{% endblock %} {% block api %}

T5.Annotation

deprecated

The T5.Annotation has been replaced by the T5.Marker, however, the T5.Annotation has been maintained for backwards compatibility but will be removed before a stable 1.0 release of Tile5.

T5.ImageAnnotation

deprecated

The T5.ImageAnnotation has been replaced by the T5.ImageMarker, however, the T5.ImageAnnotation has been maintained for backwards compatibility but will be removed before a stable 1.0 release of Tile5.
